dt: {bc}to lock or secure with or as if with a key {bc}{sx|fasten||}: such as
{bc}to secure (something, as a pulley on a shaft) by a key
{bc}to finish off (an arch) by inserting a {d_link|keystone|keystone}
{bc}to bring into harmony or conformity {bc}make appropriate {bc}{sx|attune||}
{bc}to identify (a biological specimen) by a key {dx_def}see {dxt|key:1||3d}{/dx_def}
{bc}to provide with identifying or explanatory cross-references
{bc}to enter or input (text or data) by using a keyboard
{bc}to be essential to {bc}play the most important part in
{bc}to vandalize by scratching with a key
{bc}to observe the position or movement of an opposing player in football in order to anticipate the play

dt.t: The middle linebacker was {wi}keying{/wi} on the halfback.

dt: {bc}to operate a machine by means of a keyboard {bc}{sx|keyboard||}

shortdef: to lock or secure with or as if with a key : fasten: such as
to secure (something, as a pulley on a shaft) by a key
to finish off (an arch) by inserting a keystone

dt: {bc}to make (something) suitable for (a particular use or type of person)

dt.t: I try to {it}key{/it} my lectures {it}to{/it} my audience.
The educational program {it}is keyed to{/it} the needs of working women.

dt: {bc}to change (something) in a way that is closely related to (something else)

dt.t: The amount of money they receive {it}is keyed to{/it} the rate of inflation.

shortdef: to make (something) suitable for (a particular use or type of person) —often used as (be) keyed to
to change (something) in a way that is closely related to (something else) —usually used as (be) keyed to
